description:
• You control the geometric figure.
  • You need to catch "0" & "1" and dodge bugs
  • Your goal is to collect as many points as possible. 
  • You will be faced with many obstacles that you need to avoid in order to continue your suffering.
  • You need to constantly improve your skill to open next levels.

For more information, you just should click the "help" button.

Alpha version features:

  • 3 unlockable characters
  • Some challenges
  • First level

Characteristics:

  • Standard
  • Armored
  • Faster

In future:

  • More challenges
  • More characters
  • Story mode
  • More levels

Controls: 

  • Click - player direction
  • Swipe - jump

Contact mail: studio.pixlostpath@gmail.com
